about:
I am a seasoned full-stack developer who have +7 years experience of web programming.

Throughout my career, I have gained extensive experience in various IT fields, including blockchain and AI.
Also I built several successful web/mobile apps in my carrer so I can implement any idea based on my experience.
I am very passionate and highly responsable.
I am a dedicated individual who thrives on learning new skills and embracing challenges.
With an insatiable curiosity and a drive for personal growth, I am constantly seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge and abilities.
Whether it's diving into a new subject matter or honing existing talents, I approach each endeavor with enthusiasm and a strong sense of ownership.
